plot outline: The spirit of a murdered girl follows the three girls (Kavya, Karthika, Manya). At sunrise, Chacko (Vineeth Kumar) and Vinod inform the police inspector (Rajan P. Dev) Ram's (Mammootty) missing. They are terrified to discover that Ram died when they met their accident. They return to the forest house, and Minu once again tries using an Ouija board. Ram's spirit comes to them and they flee the house; they discover that Vinod was cheating them. The soul of Ram follows Vinod and kills him in a marsh.
title: Aparichithan
plot: Three college girls, on their way to a hill resort, meet a stranger. Though he is a nuisance for them at first, later they become friends and by then he is missing...

The spirit of a murdered girl follows the three girls (Kavya, Karthika, Manya). At sunrise, Chacko (Vineeth Kumar) and Vinod inform the police inspector (Rajan P. Dev) Ram's (Mammootty) missing. They are terrified to discover that Ram died when they met their accident. They return to the forest house, and Minu once again tries using an Ouija board. Ram's spirit comes to them and they flee the house; they discover that Vinod was cheating them. The soul of Ram follows Vinod and kills him in a marsh.::Chathunni
